I just had a job complete which was restored from a previous jobs
recover.gz file. None of the reports (crawl-manifest.txt,
crawl-report.txt, etc.) were created when the job completed.

Details:

- Heritrix 1.0.0 with my ARCWriter modification to only write
  text/html content types.

- Exclusionary URIRegExp filter, updated several times during the
  crawl.

I expect that either of these two points could cause problems, but I
wanted to check.

Also, in the heritrix-1.0.0 binary tarball (manifest_bundle.pl wasn't
included --- it can be found in the source distro in the scripts
directory.

Peace,

    -tree
